# AGH University dominates Polish Academic Championship in snowboarding-- AGH UST 

URL: https://agh.edu.pl/en/detail/agh-university-dominates-polish-academic-championship-in-snowboarding
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:07:40

Photograph: AZS US Katowice 

 AGH University dominates Polish Academic Championship in snowboarding 

 10-03-2025 

 sports 

 The AGH University won in general classification of women and men at the Polish Academic Championship in snowboarding. What is more, our athletes were also successful individually. 

The AGH University winners are: Jakub Luboński – gold in slalom, Patryk Urbański – gold in banked slalom, Krystian Nowak – bronze in banked slalom.

General classification of universities

Men

AGH University of Krakow

Warsaw University of Technology

University of Warsaw

Women

AGH University of Krakow

Jagiellonian University

University of Physical Education in Krakow

The Polish Academic Championship in snowboarding took place on 6–9 March 2025 in Białka Tatrzańska. More than 280 participants from 42 universities competed in two categories, slalom and banked slalom. The event was organised by the Academic Sports Association of the University of Silesia (AZS US).

Photograph: AZS US Katowice
